name: A-LocateD
description:
Are you a Robot?

Now you can be! Play as Tiwi, a cute, lovely robot toy. Only problem: the dog got you first, and now all your parts are missing! Also, you kinda miss your owner, little Sammy - will you find your way back to them?

A short and fun 3d Jump'n'Run game made by current/former students of the S4G School for Games as part of the Global Game Jam 2021. Enjoy!
